value:
$WmMPID_春祭カゲロウ,ch05_13_Kagerou_F_SpringFes18,Face|A ninja must blend in with the
surroundings—that's rule one. It's
essential to the mission.$k$pBut... These clothes... This festival...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_SpringFes18,Face|When I was told my mission would be
to fight in a tournament, I had no
concerns. Then I saw this outfit...$k$pI hope we don't encounter anybody
we know while we're here.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭カゲロウ,ch05_13_Kagerou_F_SpringFes18,Face|We cannot run from duty. We must
put our feelings to the side and fight
with diligence and pride.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_SpringFes18,Face|You're right. No matter what the
mission entails, we must never shrink
from our responsibility.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_春祭カゲロウ,ch05_13_Kagerou_F_SpringFes18,Face|We were bested in battle. The shame
of it...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_SpringFes18,Face|For now, we must retreat. Another
chance will come. We must wait for it.$k$p$Sbs150|
